[Global Namespace]

Global namespace.

Types
RenderModes
enum RenderModes {...}

Render modes used by entities (entvars_t::rendermode)

Values
kRenderNormal

(0) src

kRenderTransColor

(1) c*a+dest*(1-a)

kRenderTransTexture

(2) src*a+dest*(1-a)

kRenderGlow

(3) src*a+dest -- No Z buffer checks

kRenderTransAlpha

(4) src*srca+dest*(1-srca)

kRenderTransAdd

(5) src*a+dest
